FuncDef:
The ca-name command configures the name of the CA in the PKI realm.
The undo ca-name command removes the name of the CA in the PKI realm. The ca-name command configures the name of the CA in the PKI realm. The undo ca-name command removes the name of the CA in the PKI realm. By default, a PKI realm does not have a CA name.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the CA.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. If the string is enclosed in double quotation marks ("), spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the name of the CA certificate file through which the CA name is obtained.
-

Specifies the name of the CA certificate file through which the CA name is obtained.
It is a string of 1 to 64 characters and case insensitive, and the CA certificate must have been imported to the realm.
